description:
Crazy Strange Sounds is a FUN application packed with tons of unique ringtones that will definitely set your phone apart from the crowd!

This ringtone collection is full of the craziest, strangest and most random sounds! There is a great range of different types of phone rings to choose from, including antique phones and office phones. If you’re looking for unique alarm sounds, check out the Stock Exchange Bell or the Radioactive Alarm Sound on this app. There are also various types of vehicle sounds: from helicopters, to motorcycles, police cars and even cruise ships. You’ll find a vehicle sound that suits your mood.

All of these sounds and more are available on this FUN Crazy Strange Sounds app!

NOTE: We highly recommend that you have WiFi or good network connection in order to experience the full functionality of this app.
